implementation_tasks.title: Add Eval section to zh.json translation file
implementation_tasks.description:
Add a comprehensive `Eval` section to `/messages/zh.json` with all Chinese text from the evaluation module. The section should include:

1. Basic UI text (title, buttons, placeholders)
2. Status messages (pending, running, completed, failed, unknown)
3. Card component text
4. Dialog text for creating evaluations
5. Detail page text
6. Table headers and messages
7. Metrics descriptions
8. Pagination text
9. Loading skeleton comments

Use the exact Chinese text identified in the plan. Ensure proper JSON formatting and nested structure for logical grouping.
acceptance_criteria: All evaluation module Chinese text is included in the zh.json file
Proper JSON formatting with no syntax errors
Message keys match the component implementation
No hardcoded Chinese text remains in components

implementation_tasks.title: Update client components with useTranslations hook
implementation_tasks.description:
Update all client components in the evaluation module to use the useTranslations hook instead of hardcoded Chinese text. Components to update:

1. `/src/components/eval/eval-main-content.tsx`
2. `/src/components/eval/eval-card.tsx`
3. `/src/components/eval/create-eval-dialog.tsx`
4. `/src/components/eval/eval-page-client.tsx`
5. `/src/components/eval/detail/eval-detail-page.tsx`
6. `/src/components/eval/detail/eval-detail-header.tsx`
7. `/src/components/eval/detail/eval-info-cards.tsx`
8. `/src/components/eval/detail/eval-results-table.tsx`
9. `/src/components/eval/detail/eval-detail-table.tsx`
10. `/src/components/eval/detail/eval-metric-card.tsx`
11. `/src/components/eval/eval-pagination.tsx`

For each component:
- Import useTranslations from next-intl
- Create a t function with 'Eval' namespace
- Replace all hardcoded Chinese text with appropriate t() calls
- Handle dynamic values like {count} and {date} properly
- Ensure consistent key naming with camelCase
acceptance_criteria: All 11 components updated with useTranslations hook
No hardcoded Chinese text remaining in evaluation components
All translation keys follow camelCase naming convention
